nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Create a content calendar for company name for their email campaigns for the next two weeks. Include number emails and types of content for each email, based on information {{company_name}} {{email_types}} {{number_emails}} {{target_audience}} . Use A/B testing for the subject lines.

email_types.title: Email Types
email_types.description: Select the types of content you want to include in your emails (e.g., promotional emails, newsletters, product updates, educational content).

company_name.title: Company Name
company_name.description: Enter the name of your company

number_emails.title: Number of Emails
number_emails.description: Specify the desired number of emails for the two-week period.

target_audience.title: Target Audience
target_audience.description: If you have different segments of your audience, specify them for targeted content (e.g., new customers, loyal customers).
